scripts.visual:test-docker: docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)":/workspace -w /workspace --network host --ipc=host --security-opt seccomp=unconfined mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.55.0-noble npx playwright test visual.spec.ts
scripts.visual:update-docker: docker run --rm -v "$(pwd)":/workspace -w /workspace --network host --ipc=host --security-opt seccomp=unconfined mcr.microsoft.com/playwright:v1.55.0-noble npx playwright test visual.spec.ts --update-snapshots
scripts.visual:dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run visual:test-docker"
scripts.visual:prod: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run visual:test-docker"
scripts.visual:update-dev: concurrently "npm run dev" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run visual:update-docker"
scripts.visual:update-prod: npm run build && concurrently "npm run start" "wait-on http://localhost:3000 && npm run visual:update-docker"
